Name: cerebral cavernous malformation
Definition: A cerebrovascular disease that is characterized by dilated blood-filled capillaries lacking structural support.

Name: cerebral artery occlusion
Definition: A corneal disease characterized by structural changes within the cornea causing it to thin and change

Name: basal ganglia cerebrovascular disease
Definition: Alpha thalassemia is a thalassemia involving the genes HBA1and HBA2 hemoglobin genes.

Name: cerebral arteritis
Definition: A central nervous system disease that is characterized by the collection or gathering of pus within the subdural space.

Name: intracranial arterial disease
Definition: A syndrome that involves pre-excitation of the ventricles due to an accessory pathway providing an abnormal electrical communication from the atria to the ventricles.

Name: intracranial vasospasm
Definition: A cerebral arterial disease characterized by constriction of certain arteries at the base of the brain. Blood flow is blocked by the constriction and also by blood clots.

Name: brain ischemia
Definition: An ischemia that is characterized by insufficient blood flow to the brain to meet metabolic demand.

Name: carotid artery disease
Definition: A lymphatic system disease that is characterized by an excessive number of histiocytes.

Name: brain infarction
Definition: A cerebrovascular disease that is characterized by tissue necrosis located_in the brain

Name: intracranial thrombosis
Definition: A rheumatic disease and collagen disease that involves the abnormal growth of connective tissue

Name: intracranial embolism
Definition: A hypersensitivity reaction type IV disease that is characterized by chronic urticarial rash and monoclonal IgM gammopathy

Name: occlusion precerebral artery
Definition: A papillary carcinoma that is located_in the kidney pelvis.
Synonym: occlusion and stenosis of precerebral artery

Name: anterior spinal artery syndrome
Definition: A substance abuse that involves the recurring use of amphetamines despite negative consequences.
